alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Barrow, northwestern Clarke and southern Jackson Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bear Creek Reservoir, or 9 miles east of Winder, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Statham, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Athens-Clarke County, Bear Creek Reservoir and Westgate Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
